SEARCH
Module com.example.project4
Package com.example.project4.controller

Class BurgerCustomController

java.lang.Object
com.example.project4.controller.BurgerCustomController
public class BurgerCustomController extends Object
Controller for the burger customization popup. Allows staff to select bread, patty style, add-ons, and quantity for a burger, and sends the result back to the main controller when "Add to Order" is clicked.
Author:
Yakelin Melendez-Gonzalez, Nivedha Sundar

  • Method Details

    • setOnBurgerAdded

      public void setOnBurgerAdded(Consumer<Burger> callback)
      Sets the callback that will be triggered when a burger is successfully added to the order.
      Parameters:
      callback - a Consumer that accepts the Burger object

    • increaseQuantity

      private void increaseQuantity()
      Increases the quantity selected by the user. Updates the quantity label.

    • decreaseQuantity

      private void decreaseQuantity()
      Decreases the quantity, ensuring it doesn't go below zero. Updates the quantity label.

    • addToOrder

      void addToOrder()
      Gathers all the selected customization options, creates a Burger object, and returns it via the provided callback. If no quantity is selected, it alerts the user.
